definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: It has an easy mounting solution thanks to the optional wall-mount arm.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個易於安裝的解決方案由於可選的壁掛式手臂。

sentences.english: The wall-mounted direct water fountain has a health-care function and is easy to maintain.
sentences.chinese: 本壁掛式直飲機具有保健功能且易於維修。

sentences.english: Wall mounting type install in W. H.
Wall-mounted barbecue area lighting can enhance after-hours entertaining.
sentences.chinese: 壁掛式燒烤區的照明可以提高下班後的娛樂性。

sentences.english: Our window air conditioner is broken, so my father has decided to replace it with a separate hanging air conditioner.
sentences.chinese: 我家的窗機壞了，爸爸決定換個分體式的壁掛機。

sentences.english: It may be wall-mounted or placed on a shelf either horizontally or vertically.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是壁掛式或放在貨架上的水平或垂直。

sentences.english: There are two types of sterilization machine, which are wall-hanging and built-in.
sentences.chinese: 消毒櫃有壁掛式和嵌入式兩種。

sentences.english: Both boxes are easy to install, bolting to the backs of wall-mount domes.
sentences.chinese: 兩個盒子易於安裝，能閂在壁掛式攝像機的背面。

sentences.english: The readout is displayed on a wall-mounted computer screen.
sentences.chinese: 這些檢驗數值都會顯示在壁掛式的電腦屏幕上。

sentences.english: We are also interested in wall mounted super mini version of this trap.
sentences.chinese: 我們也有興趣在壁掛式超迷你版這個陷阱。

sentences.english: Our Factory specializes in standard level fire tubes used in the EU style Wall-Hung Gas Boiler.
sentences.chinese: 本廠專業生產歐款壁掛爐標準水平排煙管的企業。

sentences.english: At least 5 years working experience in CB or household appliance sales.
sentences.chinese: 有5年以上家用電器或壁掛爐銷售經驗。

sentences.english: For a more out-of-sight solution, wall-mount small boxes.
sentences.chinese: 一個更能遠離人的視線的解決辦法是壁掛式的小盒子。

sentences.english: Paintings and wall hangings can be wiped clean by spraying soapy water on them.
sentences.chinese: 畫，壁掛，可擦乾淨他們噴灑肥皂水。

sentences.english: All wall hangings will have a hardboard or cardboard finish at the back.
sentences.chinese: 所有壁掛將會在後面的硬質纖維板或紙板完成。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
maneki-neko or "lucky cat", Japanese figurine cat usually found at the entrance of shops, restaurants etc, believed to bring good fortune
pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
Tonggu county in Yichun 宜春, Jiangxi
